items.text:
I'm adding the support for gravity in next release.
You could try:
compile 'com.nex3z:flow-layout:1.1.1'

    
      
    

      
    

    
  
<com.nex3z.flowlayout.FlowLayout
    android:id="@+id/flow"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="300dp"
    android:gravity="center_vertical"
    android:background="@android:color/darker_gray"
    app:flChildSpacing="auto"
    app:flRowSpacing="8dp"/>
    
      
    

      
    

    
  
The layout above will produce:
items.href: Is there a way to set layout's gravity? · Issue #10 · nex3z/FlowLayout · GitHub
Is there a way to set layout's gravity? · Issue #10 · nex3z/FlowLayout · GitHub
